thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Stratford Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Attending Footie
thread.title_full: Attending Footie - Review of Premier Inn London Stratford Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: anthonyhC1483CX
title: Attending Footie
text:
We were attending the London Stadium to watch West Ham, and this hotel is perfectly placed for that.
Clean, tidy, nice bar and very good security with regards access to passageways and rooms. You even have to swipe your room key in the lift to use it to access floors where the rooms are situated.
Breakfast was plentiful, staff keen to help and the WestGate shopping centre is next door also.
All in all, a perfect stay.
